module.name: Time Conditions
module.description: Creates a condition where calls will go to one of two destinations (eg, an extension, IVR, ring group..) based on the time and/or date. This can be used for example to ring a receptionist during the day, or go directly to an IVR at night.
module.changelog: *12.0.6* FREEPBX-7997 Systems with /var and /tmp on different partitions cause problems. Use Asterisk's temporary directory instead. *12.0.5* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *12.0.4* Spelling Fixes *12.0.3* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *12.0.2* FREEPBX-7166 check destinations bug *12.0.1* FREEPBX-6415 Password and Invert BLF Abilities *2.11.0.6* Update license *2.11.0.5* Add toggle all feature code *2.11.0.4* Database Abstraction Layer Changes *2.11.0.2* FREEPBX-5982 Update Feature Code Admin Descriptions when Time Conditions Changes *2.11.0.1* syntax error *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.2* #5476, #5478 *2.10.0.1* misc bugs *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.7* #5175, #5176 *2.9.0.6* #5030, spelling errors *2.9.0.5* #4725 *2.9.0.4* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.3* #4651, #4655 *2.9.0.2* #4636 sticky override added *2.9.0.1* #4636 typo broke hints, broken destination *2.9.0.0* #4636 Add Auto-resetting manual override
